name: Download Simulator
description:
Download Simulator is a incremental game about downloading files, upgrading your internet speed and watching green progress bars.

Is the game finished?

The game is not yet finished, and I will still support the game with updates after its completion.
I still plan to publish the game on Android, and for this I ask for your contribution.
You can help me reach my goal by donating or helping Download Sim grow. Any donation amount is greatly appreciated.

You can submit your feedback and suggestions in the comments or preferably at our Discord Server.

 

Join our Discord Server to follow future projects 

You can download the executable version here.
